website_summaries.verdict: The workout-focused JLab Epic2 Bluetooth earphones deliver a bass-forward sound signature in one of the more secure in-ear fits on the market.
pros: Powerful audio performance with boosted bass response
Exceptionally secure fit with several eartip options
cons: Could use more high frequency presence and clarity
Easy to accidentally skip a track when adjusting volume

customer_reviews.title: Interference during a calls
customer_reviews.text: Superb headphones. But the one thing I really needed them for and that no one seems to test or comment on in reviews is call quality. I returned as there’s a bit of interference and it’s impossible to speak with both ears in. That said, just returned my Powerbeats 3 also as they are horrendous in calls, like calling from inside an electric razor whilst inside a washing machine
customer_reviews.author: Firms

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after less than 5 months of use light use
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked great for almost 5 months. Then repeatedly disconnected from my phone and tablet during use. Now they will not reconnect. Didn't even last 6 months. No option on Amazon to return after the first 6 weeks. Not good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: I was happy on receiving
customer_reviews.text: I was happy on receiving, did what is said on the tin but that did not last long, battery problems. I got a refund and replaced with same but again they failed after about 3 months, contacted JLab who replaced, but they lasted about 5 months, sorry but for the price I would expect more, would not recommend anyone buying them, they just are not up to the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G A R Watt

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and hold. Great sound but not durable enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these headphones last year - the sound and fit were excellent but they died within a few months (unable to charge). I got a full refund and decided to try them again but this time they only lasted 3 weeks before completely failing again. Reading other reviews people have had the same issues. There is clearly a problem with this product. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not very good sound quality in my opinion ear phones for £5 at tesco sound a lot better
customer_reviews.author: David jarvis

customer_reviews.title: A lot of ££ for some fancy packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for running and needed something durable and waterproof, they broke after 3 months would never buy from this company again. That price is high but you don't get what you pay for I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael86

customer_reviews.title: Bad mic and not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mic quality was very bad I couldn't hear a word on the other end and they aren't very comfortable in ear. I saw the YouTube video reviews say it was good but they just aren't
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Whooley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: They worked fine for about 6 months and the they stopped working after getting weat with sweat
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Best i have had so far
customer_reviews.text: Best for running. fits perfectly. Enjoying my fitness so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I only noticed these reviews after i bought the headphones . . .. typical. But I am personally happy with them and work well for me when MTB'ing. . . Not yet taken a call on that ride to know how well they handle wind etc but this was not something I was too fussed about.
customer_reviews.author: Beardy_Man

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and intermittent connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Stoped working after several months. No way to return as older than a month. Worked fine at first but then had connection issues and then stopped holding a change. Very frustrating and disappointing given they cost £100.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Herschell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The fit is terrible! You need to spend forever to try and adjust them. The sound is very disappointing and the music stops playing and you need to restart it every few seconds. This was a free gift from O2 with my Galaxy phone but they will be going in the bin!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Really quiet
customer_reviews.text: Really, really quiet..and annoying to get to fit the ear everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Proteus Duxbury

product_meta.title: JLab Audio Epic2 Bluetooth 4.0 Wireless Sport Earbuds, GUARANTEED fitness, waterproof IPX5 rated, skip-free sound, pristine high-performance 8mm sound drivers, 12hr play time w/microphone - Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:wireless| Colour Name:BlackThe Epic2 Bluetooth Earbuds have you primed for your best. We've taken the award-winning Epic Bluetooth Earbuds and made them more waterproof, more skip-proof with BeaconTM Signal Technology, and even longer lasting with up to 12 hours of playtime. All while keeping that perfect fit, made just for you. With best-in-class 12-hour battery life, a fitness-proof design and immersive skip-free sound, your best is now. Best-in-Class Playtime: With up to 12 hours of mind-blowing sound between charges, Epic2 Bluetooth Earbuds powers past the competition. Get a week's worth of workouts, almost three marathons or a round-trip flight from San Diego to New York. Talk about stamina. Plus, the battery indicator on your device will always keep you in the know. Fitness-Proof: Blood. Sweat. Tears. And whatever else you can dish out. We've spent the past two years listening and innovating. The JLab Epic2 Bluetooth Earbuds are 100 percent splash-proof, sweat-proof and washable with an IPX5 rating and . Just finished a run? Rinse off your buds for your next round. Radical Skip-Free Sound with BeaconTM Signal Technology: C3TM (Crystal Clear Clarity) technology delivers a clean, crisp, immersive sound with vibrant highs, mids and a pumping bass through pristine high-performance 8mm drivers, which are up to 50 percent larger than the competition. And an upgraded Bluetooth antenna, using Beacon Signal Technology, provides skip-free tunes, even in the most demanding situations. You spoke, we listened. Revolutionary Fit: Our proprietary Memory WireTM design returns - stronger, more comfortable and more personable with the addition of a titanium over-ear hook. We've also upped our game with eight gel-tips, including an industry-first triple flange custom fit tip. Smaller ears? Our shallow-fit tip will do the trick. All said, the Epic2 Bluetooth earbuds provide our most comfortable and personal fit ever.
feature_bullets: BEST-IN-CLASS PLAYTIME With up to 12 hours of mind-blowing sound between charges, Epic2 Bluetooth Earbuds powers past the competition. Get a week's worth of workouts, almost three marathons or a round-trip flight from San Diego to New York. Talk about stamina. Plus, the battery indicator on your device will always keep you in the know.

FITNESS-PROOF Blood. Sweat. Tears. And whatever else you can dish out. We've spent the past two years listening and innovating. The JLab Epic2 Bluetooth Earbuds are 100 percent splash-proof, sweat-proof and washable with an IPX5 rating with an ultra-sonic sealed battery compartment and plasma coated microelectronics. Just finished a run? Rinse off your buds for your next round.

RADICAL SKIP-FREE SOUND WITH BEACONTM SIGNAL TECHNOLOGY C3TM (Crystal Clear Clarity) technology delivers a clean, crisp, immersive sound with vibrant highs, mids and a pumping bass through pristine high-performance 8mm drivers, which are up to 50 percent larger than the competition. And an upgraded Bluetooth antenna, using Beacon Signal Technology, provides skip-free tunes, even in the most demanding situations. You spoke, we listened. Learn about JLab's Beacon Signal Tech.

REVOLUTIONARY FIT Our proprietary Memory WireTM design returns - stronger, more comfortable and more personable with the addition of a titanium over-ear hook. We've also upped our game with eight gel-tips, including an industry-first triple flange custom fit tip. Smaller ears? Our shallow-fit tip will do the trick. All said, the Epic2 Bluetooth earbuds provide our most comfortable and personal fit ever.

BLUETOOTH 4.0 Free yourself from cumbersome cables with the magic of BT 4.0 w/ aptX Tech, providing amazing wireless audio quality. An upgraded ceramic antenna provides unsurpassed connectivity, reduces environmental detuning. Make calls. Listen to music. Do work. All from up to 30 feet away. ROCKS W/ ANDROID & APPLE The universal mic, track control gives you complete control on. Make calls. Pump up or down the volume. Change tracks. Upgraded microphone, an intuitive button layout.
